items.content: Deep within the ancient forest, shadows stir with unrest.
You are the Druid of Peace, keeper of harmony between all living things.
But something has changed. The forest whispers of conflict...
You sense the discord spreading through the woodland realms.
Creatures that once lived in harmony now eye each other with suspicion.
Your mission is clear: restore peace before the forest tears itself apart.
As a Druid of Peace, you possess unique abilities:
üïäÔ∏è PEACE AURA - Calms hostile creatures and reduces their will to fight
üåø HIDDEN NATURE - You remain unseen, observing conflicts from the shadows
üèÉ RETREAT - When overwhelmed, escape to fight another day
Remember: True strength lies not in conquest, but in understanding.
Every creature has a reason for their anger. Find it. Heal it.

items.text: I understand. I will bring peace to the forest.
This sounds dangerous. What if I fail?

items.content: Your resolve strengthens the very roots of the forest.
The woodland spirits smile upon your dedication.
Go forth, Druid. May wisdom guide your path.
Fear is natural, young druid. Even the mightiest oak was once an acorn.
You do not walk this path alone. The forest itself will aid you.
Trust in your abilities. Peace is not weakness‚Äîit is the greatest strength.
